topicaltesttopics.prompt: Create a set of questions that can be used to assess if someone knows about the following topic:

topics.title: ibs or irritable bowel syndrome
topics.objective: finding someone to write a health article for an in-flight  magazine
topics.description: IBS and its symptoms, treatments, and prognosis; causes, both lifestyle-related and somatic.

topics.title: choice of school and degree for high-schoolers
topics.objective: we want to hire a career advisor for our city school system
topics.description: Educational choice determines much of a student's future. Students want to study what they enjoy, what challenges them, and what is practically feasible for them. A career advisor needs to know about such things and also about future market outlooks for graduates with different degrees.

topics.title: wine and terroir
topics.objective: finding someone to write a popular science article for a gastronomy lifestyle magazine
topics.description: The taste and chacter of wine is influenced by the terroir of the viticulture. We want to find someone with personal understanding of oenology to write a knowledgeable paper about this.
Many believe that handwriting reveals a lot about the writer's personality traits and employability. What are some things to think about when doing graphological analysis?

topics.id: marketing strategies for a newly founded publishing company
topics.description: We need help to define how to market our publishing company to creators, distributors, and readers. We need interview questions for candidates to hire.
Our clothing store will open a department with cosplay materials. We need interview questions for candidates to hire to manage it.
Our company needs to hire someone who can tailor itineraries for very demanding customers. We need challenging interview questions for candidates for the position.

topics.id: guidance for professional attire and wardrobe choice
topics.description: Our employees dress badly and we need to give them guidance. We need to select someone to be the attire counselor.

topics.objective: We need to step up our food safety routines
topics.description: We need to hire someone to oversee our food storage, food preparation, and cleaning routines.

topics.id: quality assessment of generative AI systems
topics.description: We need a quiz to test the quality of a generative language model.
Elevator maintenance involves both routine upkeep and periodic inspection. What does a technician need to know to handle this?
We want to hire a correspondent who understands the research on climate change.
Tea, the drink, its preparation and serving, agriculture, and responsible sourcing.

topics.objective: finding someone to write a feature article for a lifestyle magazine
topics.description: What are some of the good and bad things about starting a company in tech (including adjacent business sectors).

topics.objective: hiring an editor for a tabloid
topics.description: How can an editor detect that a news story is bunk?
Health insurance works differently in different markets. Our company needs to know about this.

topics.id: Harry Potter books and Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry
topics.description: Harry Potter lore, characters, consistency, detail, bloopers, including fan fiction.

topics.objective: hiring a commentator for a radio station
topics.description: Latest developments in basketball

topics.objective: hiring a commentator for a radio station
topics.description: Including history, arcane detail, and literary connotations.

topics.title: vegan food economy and ethics
topics.description: Vegan food production, costs, alternative use of the resources, sustainability, ethical consideration including animal rights.

topics.id: using social media to become a successful influencer
topics.description: I need help to become a famous influencer and I want to hire an assistant who knows how to use social media for maximum impact.
Things a receptionist should know to do their job, their duties, and what they should not expect to do.
We need an advisor to manage business investments in the pharmaceutical sector.

topics.title: risks and benefits of keeping a pet cat
topics.description: A set of questions to help decide if one should get a pet cat or not.
